entry.title: Only just a Maybe
entry.summary:
Author: promethazin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,714Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 179

Summary: Buck aches.His leg aches, his head swims, and his heart seizes.Now that Eddie is in Texas, Buck‚Äôs usual anchor feels far out of reach.It‚Äôs too easy to slip back into old patterns as the memories he so carefully boxed away start to claw their way out.He‚Äôs survived worse. But this time, it‚Äôs quiet.This time, there‚Äôs no fire, no chaosAnd that might be the most dangerous part.

entry.title: The Third Man Factor
entry.summary:
Author: epublover

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,809Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 4

Summary: "What happened to you not believing in that stuff?" Hen teased.¬†"Something change while you were away?" What, besides everything? Normally, Buck would join in on the teasing, too. Honestly, he'd probably be leading the charge‚Äî but considering the fact that they still weren't talking outside of work-related matters (which, now that they weren't partnered, turns out pretty few and far between), he chose to keep his thoughts to himself instead. The group wasn't missing much, anyways. They mainly consisted of a steady stream of what the fucks sandwiched between flashes of his dead captain and questions along the lines of when should I apologize to Eddie and how should I apologize to Eddie and will Eddie accept my apology.¬† Eddie shrugged to the group, nonchalant in a way that no one believed. "S'been busier than usual. That's all." Hen huffed. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs one way to describe it.‚ÄùBuck has a bad day at work, he asks the trauma counsellor to help him make sense of it. Or; Eddie has an okay day at work, the trauma counsellor wants to talk about it anyways.

entry.title: First Steps To Are Forever
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,551Chapters: 13/20Kudos: 21

Summary: It wasn‚Äôt supposed to be more than friendship‚Äîjust support, just family, just being there. But somewhere between takeout nights, shared laughter, and long shifts that blurred into dawn, Buck realizes the truth he‚Äôs been running from: he‚Äôs not orbiting Eddie out of loyalty. He‚Äôs falling. Hard. With every small act of care‚Äîevery folded sweater, every cleaned dish, every stolen glance‚ÄîBuck feels himself pulled closer to a truth too dangerous to name. entry.title: Who Takes Care of You?
entry.summary:
Author: Spruce_Goose

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,858Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 46

Summary: Eddie has always been a light sleeper. Between the Army, Chris, and his job as a firefighter, the smallest noise or creak of a floorboard has him shooting out of bed on high alert. Usually, it‚Äôs nothing; a branch falling outside his window, a bird flapping its wings, or the floorboards settling back into place. Once or twice, he caught Chris sneaking around long after Eddie had put him to bed. It‚Äôs something he‚Äôs come to recognise as a face of life. The sky is blue, the grass is green, and Eddie Diaz can get woken up by a falling leaf. **** OR Chris is sick, Eddie watches over him, with a smidge of Buddie at the end. entry.title: I can't wait to be your number one
entry.summary:
Author: jylbas

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,556Chapters: 3/9Kudos: 11

Summary: Eddie knows Buck loves him. He knows he would kiss him back, hold him, make him feel safe. Because that‚Äôs Buck. And wherever Eddie goes, Buck follows.Eddie knows, Buck wouldn‚Äôt reject him if he laid out his heart in front of him.But that‚Äôs the thing. Buck doesn‚Äôt know. He sure wouldn‚Äôt think twice about it, cause that‚Äôs how they are and Buck‚Äôs always done everything for everyone else. He doesn‚Äôt think he‚Äôs worth it, so he thinks he has to prove it. And god Eddie wants to prove it, wants to scream at him and shake him awake, that he is enough.He doesn‚Äôt. Instead he tries to show him. And maybe, if he would tell him how he feels, how much he loves him. Maybe Buck would be okay. They would be okay.But Eddie knows Buck is not ready for that. Not yet anyway. He doesn‚Äôt want to take it away from him, the realization, the revelation. He wants Buck to have this for himself, wants him to make the first step. Because he knows Buck loves him and he has all the time in the world.So he waits.Or Eddie figures out a lot of stuff, but he is not afraid of Buck not loving him back. He knows he does
